title: vElan pOla
sahitya:
vElan pOla urutuNai vErevar AvArO nIla mayil vAhana lIlA lOlanAna


anupallavi

  hAlamuNDOn aNaiyum bAla daNDAyudan jnAlam koNDADum jnAna paNDitanAna


caraNam    inda mAniDap-piravi eDuttOr adan phalanai enda vidam aDaivadu enbadai arindiDa]
cintai nirainduLLa andhakAram maraindiDa vindai arivin oLi tandaruL purindiDa
